Uses of Class
games.Card

  • Uses of Card in games

    Subclasses of Card in games
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Euchre
    A class to simulate playing a round of Euchre.
    class  Player
    A Class to create a player for the Euchre class.
    Methods in games that return Card
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Card Card.getCard()
    Get the entire card object.
    Card Player.getCard​(int index)
    Get one of the players cards at a specified index.
    Card Euchre.getPlayedCard​(int index)
    Get the played card of a player on the current round.
    Methods in games that return types with arguments of type Card
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Card> Player.getCards()
    Returns the full array of this players cards.
    java.util.ArrayList<Card> Euchre.getDeck()
    Gets the deck of total cards that are currently left.
    Methods in games with parameters of type Card
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Player.giveCard​(Card card)
    Give an additional card to a player.
    void Euchre.setPlayedCard​(Card card, int index)
    Sets the card played for a player during a round.
    void Player.setPreroundCards​(Card[] arr)
    Gives this player the number of cards in the parameter.
